Description: model type of the master Interbotix Arm (the one being physically manipulated)
model type of the puppet Interbotix Arm (the one that is torqued on and that responds to commands)
name of the 'root' link on the 'master' arm; typically 'base_link', but can be changed if attaching the arm to a mobile base that already has a 'base_link' frame
name of the 'root' link on the 'puppet' arm; typically 'base_link', but can be changed if attaching the arm to a mobile base that already has a 'base_link' frame
the file path to the master 'mode config' YAML file
the file path to the puppet 'mode config' YAML file
launches RViz to show both arms
file path to the config file RViz should load
true if the `xsarm_control.launch` file should be launched - set to false if you would like to run your own version of this file separately
if true, the Dynamixel simulator node is run; use RViz to visualize the robot's motion; if false, the real Dynamixel driver node is run
